original_text: And it was so, when they came into the midst of the city, that Ishmael the son of Nethaniah slew them, and cast them into the midst of the pit, he, and the men that were with him.
korean_text: 그들이 성읍 중앙에 이를 때에 느다냐의 아들 이스마엘이 자기와 함께 있던 사람들과 더불어 그들을 죽여 구덩이 가운데에 던지니라

sentences.original_text: when they came into midst of the city
that Ishmael son of Nethaniah slew them
and cast them into midst of pit
and the men that were with him
